text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea dasyphylla is an endangered species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Sumatra and Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea dasyphylla". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33111A9757210. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33111A9757210.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
